h2_title: Where to Find the Green-Capped Martialist
content: To unlock this secret boss fight, you'll first need to encounter a simple-looking Treasure Hunter Human in Chapter 3, at the North Shore of the Bitter Lake in The New West.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Green-Capped Martialist'.
The content is as follows:
To unlock this secret boss fight, you'll first need to encounter a simple-looking Treasure Hunter Human in Chapter 3, at the North Shore of the Bitter Lake in The New West.
